text: Ian Mathias Bavitz (born June 5, 1976), better known as Aesop Rock, is an American rapper who lives in San Francisco, California. He was born in New York. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Living people Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:People from Northport, New York
title: Aesop Rock
